response.overview: Bimbo rules the world ! Such is the starting point of this epic, in which we follow a self-proclaimed “ditzy blonde.” Nelly Dansen performs to the rhythm of Iggy Azalea, highlighting how the reappropriation of stigma can serve as a way to rise toward new horizons. A quirky, crazy, but refreshing film, which maintains a staunchly feminist stance. There is no doubt that many will laugh (or cry). This documentary leaves a lasting impression, as both its form and content are deeply moving. So let yourself be swept away and follow Nelly: she will probably awaken that Bimbo buried deep inside you!
response.title: HEAD OVER HEELS
